== Edathiruthy (CT) (627873) ==

Edathiruthy (CT) is a town in the [[Kodungallur]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 9.29 sq. km. and harbouring 3153 households with total population of 12921 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 38 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 262 km. Male population is 5782 and female population is 7139. Scheduled Caste population is 2748 and Scheduled Tribes population is 56. Census Location Code of the town is 627873<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thrissur (m corp.) at a distance of 38 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 51 km. Railway station is at Irinjalakuda at a distance of 10 km.
